questions.question: This arc takes place on an island inhabited by giants and involves a struggle against a corrupt government official. What is...?
This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' journey to an island in the Grand Line, where they battle against the Warlord of the Sea, Crocodile. What is...?
Set in the East Blue, this arc features Luffy's first encounter with a Marine Captain known for his iron mace. What is...?
This advanced form of Armament Haki allows the user to emit their Haki beyond their body to attack the inside of an object. What is...?
This ability, used by a notorious pirate, grants the power to produce and control mochi. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to manipulate, produce, and turn into ice. What is...?
Known for his 'Fire Fist' attack, this character is the sworn brother of the Straw Hat Pirates' captain and had the Flame-Flame Fruit. Who is...?
This new character, introduced in the Wano Country arc, is known for their claim to be the son of Kaido and for their mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit. Who is...?
This chief of staff of the Revolutionary Army is known for his flame powers and is a sworn brother to the Straw Hat Pirates' captain. Who is...?
